Zack

Just to clarify

I have cleared up my first message. Basically I was =
agreeing with the fact that Im not a fan of Chris Moon. I didnt mean to say=
 anything about Frank and reading back on the email I should have reworded.=
anyway this is my 3rd post about it :-)

so just to clear up frank you give=
 good advice and share ideas. I messed my first message up..hell im human i=
t was an accident

Kind Regards

Eamonn

P.s. keep up the good work ;-)



=

________________________________
From: Zack Widup <w9sz.zack@...>
To=
: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Friday, 5 June, 2009 17:01:17
Subject: [EVP=
-ITC] Re: [RTSC] a copy of my final e-mail to Frank sumption I will go no f=
urther!





I'd agree to that. He shares his research, never charges for a=
nything, freely admits there are no "experts" in this field (he does not ev=
en consider=A0himself an=A0expert).

I grow more and more concerned about t=
he hatred and viciousness I see from and among=A0some "paranormal researche=
rs." It is not everybody by any means, but it=A0seems to exceed the average=
 amount of this=A0I see in other fields. I wonder why this is? Is it perhap=
s in fact because everyone deep down inside knows there are no experts in t=
his field=A0and those who try to present themselves as such know deep down =
inside they are presenting a false image?

Zack

On Fri, Jun 5, 2009 at 10:=
42 AM, Frank Ratka <warrior18eii@ yahoo.com> wrote:




Arrogant!? Sumption=
? You have a warped view of Sumption if you see arrogance. He is in your fa=
ce and speaks his mind but he has never claimed to be anything other than "=
the box" creator. Does he talk shit about people who claim to be experts? H=
ell yeah! That's one of the reason we like him. 

Regards,

Frank R.



---=
 On Fri, 6/5/09, eamonn mgherbi <eamonnmgherbi@ yahoo.co. uk> wrote:


From=
: eamonn mgherbi <eamonnmgherbi@ yahoo.co. uk>
Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: [=
RTSC] a copy of my final e-mail to Frank sumption I will go no further!
To:=
 EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com
Date: Friday, June 5, 2009, 4:58 AM


Hi All

I h=
ave to admit that I share the same opinion as Bruce. I dont what everyones =
take is on this but I felt that some of moon and even Franks attitude was s=
lightly arrogant. I am a researcher in the UK using old reel to reel method=
s and obtaining excellent results. I lost some family and some close friend=
s=A05 yeara ago=A0and suddenly it dawned on me...what is life all about. I =
went on to research every evp pioneer i could, listen to hours/days of reco=
rdings and it changed my outlook on life. tears were turned to smiles and t=
hen I realised what all this research is for. it was a big step for me spir=
itually. 

I dont know if there is anyone else on here using old fashioned =
methods but if anybody would like to hear recordings please ask. I am using=
 a reel to reel sony "Hi frequency" recorder and trying various types of to=
nes, backgrounds e.t.c.

Good luck to everyone with their research, you are=
 right we are changing history we are discovering new things. if it wasnt f=
or individuals such as raudive, jurghenson to name a few, maybe we wouldnt =
have discovered this. it takes a brave individual to tackle an arrogant hum=
an race blunted with science.

Kind Regards

The quiet one :-)




________=
________________________
From: "SnowfireL@aol. com" <SnowfireL@aol. com>
To=
: RTSC@yahoogroups. com; inside_the_box_ rtsc_talk_ radio@yahoogroup s.com;=
 EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com 

Sent: Thursday, 4 June, 2009 20:25:26
Subject: =
[EVP-ITC] Re: [RTSC] a copy of my final e-mail to Frank sumption I will go =
no further!



Sorry to hear this Bruce, I=A0sure hope things get better, =
=A0I had no idea there were so many problems when I joined all these lists,=
 =A0I think you are all great people, you folks together are making history=
 don't you all realize this?=A0 There are so many people out there that hav=
e never heard of this type of communication, thousands out there!=A0 My fri=
end just lost her mother a couple of weeks ago, when I told her about the w=
ork you all are doing, tears were replaced with a smile, she is looking for=
ward to hearing from her mom now too.=A0 Stop trying to hurt each other, it=
's not worth it, life is too short for this stuff.=A0 You are all great peo=
ple, May God Bless You All=A0~ And He Already Has,
sf

In a message dated 6=
/4/2009 2:27:06 P.M. Eastern Daylight Time, balllan94@yahoo. com writes:


=

guys,

Sorry to burden you with this nonsense but this group and the RTSC =
group are my only venues to respond to posts on other groups and have my ac=
count heard, I hope you do not mind to much.

Here is a copy of my final pe=
rsonal e-mail to Frank Sumption which by the way is meant for him but he se=
e's fit to post them publicly in an attempt to discredit me.

I want you to=
 read it first hand so there are no chance of it being altered before it is=
 posted else where.

I will not address Frank again
------------ --------- =
--------- --------- --------- --------- -

Frank,

This is getting ridiculo=
us now, you should stop writing these posts, all you are doing is making yo=
urself look ridiculous.

I have offered many times to make my raw recording=
s available for review by anyone who wants them. I have made the same chall=
enge to your friend moon who we all know is behind this tirade he has time =
and again refused or ignored the request for any type of audio file
to be p=
ublicly posted for revue and continues to take advantage of innocent unsusp=
ecting people with his con game and charging large amounts of money for ses=
sions where he fabricates and makes up content as he goes along.

I was the=
 only one to confront him in public and expose him for the fake he is and t=
his is his feeble attempt at retaliation. I and other researchers like me h=
ave brought this research light years from where it was when you and I firs=
t met, moon just continues to use it to rip people off and has not contribu=
ted a thing to the research of ghost box communication beside lining his ow=
n pockets. 

Just the fact that he has you doing his dirty work shows the t=
ype of guy he is. I can remember a time when you publicly came out against =
any type of money making using your boxes and even refused moon when he wan=
ted to manufacture and sell them for large profits yet now you condone his =
robbery of innocent unaware people and actually act foolish on his behest.
=

Frank you are better than this, just concentrate on developing a better bo=
x and forget about moon and his tricks and lies, he is finished in the para=
normal and he knows it, everyone is wise to his game and he is practically =
an outcast.

Frank you are hitching you wagon to a dead horse. Get away fro=
m these bad influences before they ruin your reputation as well.

We have h=
ad this moon discussion in the past and once he has exhausted his need for =
you he will screw you again like he has done so many times before.

Frank, =
I like and respect you and I hope you will consider what I have said in thi=
s e-mail and I sincerely hope you post this one on the evp-itc group. I wil=
l be posting it on my group and others I belong to.

Your former friend
Bru=
ce
